colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES ZLUM GTOR GLUD DANG BCAS NAM MKHAR 'THOR BA'AM, SA GTZANG SAR, GRU BZHIR BYANG, ZLUM PO NUB, GRU GSUM LHO, ZLA GAM SHAR PHYOGS SU BSKYIL LO, SMRAS PA, SPRUL BA'I SKYES MCHOG DAM PA RGYA GAR GYI, 'BYUNG BZHI GTOR MA'I RTEN 'BREL THABS MKHAS KYIS, ,'BYUNG BZHI 'KHRUGS PA'I HAM THAG 'GRO BA LA, ,@012B BDE MDZOD BDUD RTZI'I CHAR RGYUN PHAB PA BZHIN, ,NANG RIGS GDON BGEGS MNGA' CHAR MI BZANG BA, ,SKYOB BYED RDO RJE GO CHA DAG DANG MTSUNGS, ,DON BSRUNG SPEL LEGS SNYING POR DRIL BA YI, ,CHOG BSGRIGS ME TOG GSAR BA'I PHRENG MDZES 'DI, ,BSLAB GSUM LDAN PA'I DGE SLONG NI KHRON PAS, ,LHAG BSAM DAG PAS YANG YANG BSKUL NGOR, ,MDO RGYUD MAN NGAG 'DZIN PA'I SBONG BA PA, ,BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAN MTSAN MDZAD PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
